page.title: 17My Estate
page.content:
My estate in Camberley, with five roads in it and a railway track at the bottom of one of the roads, houses several different age groups, ranging from seven months to eighty-two years.
The estate is popular because it is quiet, near the town centre, near shops, schools, and the sports centre. The houses are mostly{3 or 4 bedroomed with a living room, small dining room and a kitchen. We all have{two toilets and fairly large gardens.
The inhabitants of the estate like animals and have{pets}such as fish and tortoises.
Most of us children don't have to walk very often, because everybody has at least one{car}and usually two or three.
